caption.p: Eukaryotic lineages sampled and their taxonomic relationship. A schematic phylogenetic tree depicting the relationships between the major eukaryotic taxa. large groupings are color-coded as indicated in the legend at lower right and selected species included in the study are shown. LECA indicates the position of the last eukaryotic common ancestor. the tree structure is loosely based on the recent topology described in Burki et al., 2020
